statements: SELECT * FROM premium_payments;
SELECT payment_id, amount FROM premium_payments WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT payment_id, payment_date FROM premium_payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, amount, payment_date FROM premium_payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM premium_payments;
SELECT * FROM premium_payments WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, amount FROM premium_payments WHERE paid = true ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, payment_date, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM premium_payments GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT payment_id, customer_id, payment_date FROM premium_payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM premium_payments WHERE customer_id IN (101, 102, 103) AND amount > 500 ORDER BY customer_id ASC, amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM premium_payments_table ORDER BY payment_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT payment_id, amount FROM billing_collection_table WHERE payment_method = 'credit card'
SELECT * FROM premium_payments_table WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_paid FROM billing_collection_table GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_paid DESC
SELECT * FROM billing_collection_table ORDER BY due_date ASC
SELECT * FROM premium_payments_table WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY payment_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM billing_collection_table WHERE city = 'New York' GROUP BY last_name, first_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_payment FROM premium_payments_table
SELECT billing_date, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM premium_payments_table GROUP BY billing_date ORDER BY billing_date
SELECT * FROM billing_collection_table WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%'
SELECT * FROM PremiumPayments;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount FROM PremiumPayments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, payment_amount FROM PremiumPayments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM BillingProcess WHERE due_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, collection_amount FROM CollectionProcess ORDER BY collection_amount DESC, collection_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM PremiumPayments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, payment_amount FROM PremiumPayments WHERE payment_date = '2022-01-15' OR payment_date = '2022-01-16';
SELECT customer_id, payment_amount FROM PremiumPayments WHERE customer_id = 123 OR customer_id = 456 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM BillingProcess WHERE bill_amount < 500 AND due_date < '2022-02-28';
SELECT customer_id, bill_amount FROM BillingProcess WHERE bill_amount BETWEEN 200 AND 500 ORDER BY bill_amount DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM billing_records WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM billing_cycles WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payments GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payments GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY user_id;

SELECT u.name, p.amount, br.billing_date FROM users u INNER JOIN payments p ON u.user_id = p.user_id INNER JOIN billing_records br ON u.user_id = br.user_id WHERE p.amount >= 500 AND br.amount <= 200 ORDER BY br.billing_date ASC;
SELECT u.name, COUNT(br.record_id) AS num_billing_records FROM users u LEFT JOIN billing_records br ON u.user_id = br.user_id GROUP BY u.name HAVING num_billing_records >= 3 ORDER BY u.name;
SELECT u.user_id, u.name, bc.start_date, bc.end_date FROM users u CROSS JOIN billing_cycles bc WHERE bc.end_date > '2021-12-31' ORDER BY u.user_id, bc.start_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM payments;
SELECT payment_date, payment_amount FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, payment_amount FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM billing_history WHERE payment_id IS NULL;
SELECT customer_id, invoice_id, payment_id FROM collections WHERE collection_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%123%'

SELECT invoices.invoice_id, invoices.invoice_amount, customers.customer_name FROM invoices INNER JOIN customers ON invoices.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE invoices.invoice_amount > 1000 ORDER BY invoices.invoice_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_name, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM customers INNER JOIN payments ON customers.customer_id = payments.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_payments > 5000

SELECT customer_name, invoice_amount, payment_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN invoices ON customers.customer_id = invoices.customer_id LEFT JOIN payments ON invoices.customer_id = payments.customer_id WHERE payment_amount IS NULL OR payment_amount = 0 ORDER BY invoice_amount DESC LIMIT 5
